DOC.brief_summary: This single multiple dose study healthy male female ( non-child bearing potential ) Japanese volunteer , assess blood urine drug level Fostamatinib . Fostamatinib develop treatment rheumatoid arthritis .
DOC.brief_title: A Single Multiple Dose Study Assess Blood Urine Drug Levels Fostamatinib Healthy Japanese Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: A Phase I , Open-label Study Assess Pharmacokinetics Oral Fostamatinib Healthy Japanese Subjects After Single Multiple Doses
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female ( nonchildbearing potential ) Japanese subject 20 45 year age Body mass index ( BMI ) 17 27 kg/m2 weigh least 45 kg 100 kg History presence respiratory , GI , renal , hepatic , hematological , lymphatic , neurological , cardiovascular , psychiatric , musculoskeletal , genitourinary , immunological , dermatological , connective tissue diseases disorder Any clinically significant illness , acute infection , know inflammatory process , medical/surgical procedure trauma within 4 week first administration investigational product Smoking excess 5 cigarette per day equivalent within 30 day Day 1 Use prescription overthecounter drug within 2 week first administration investigational product Previous participation fostamatinib study
